message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $145. It's in great condition and worth a lot to the right person. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can only pay $130 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Bob, I understand your offer. While I appreciate your interest, I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about $135? It's a fair compromise and still a great deal for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've considered it, but I can't agree to $135. Could you possibly lower the price to $130? That would be more within my budget.
